Posted By: Arachnos (8/15/2012 3:15:23 PM)

posts.post_content:
One time I bought a single pack of M13.  
  
Flipped through it one card at a time.  
  
Had Searing Spear, Rancor, Flames of the Firebrand, Rewind,  
  
and Ajani.  
  
But I kept flipping, even though at this point people were cheering  
  
Past the token and the land  
  
And in the foil slot  
  
Sat this.  
  
So what did I do?  
  
I picked it up,  
  
readied my voice,  
  
and said:  
  
**SPLIT YOUR LUNGS WITH BLOOD AND THUNDER WHEN YOU SEE THE WHITE WHALE BREAK YOUR BACKS AND CRACK YOUR OARS MEN IF YOU WISH TO PREVAIL THIS IVORY LEG IS WHAT PROPELS ME HARPOONS THRUST IN THE SKY AIM DIRECTLY FOR HIS CROOKED BROW AND LOOK HIM STRAIGHT IN THE EYE**  
  
Then everyone in the store started chanting "**WHITE WHALE HOLY GRAIL!**"  
  
At any rate that's how I got kicked out of FNM. Slightly embellished.
posts.html:
One time I bought a single pack of M13.

Flipped through it one card at a time.

Had Searing Spear, Rancor, Flames of the Firebrand, Rewind,

and Ajani.

But I kept flipping, even though at this point people were cheering

Past the token and the land

And in the foil slot

Sat this.

So what did I do?

I picked it up,

readied my voice,

and said:

SPLIT YOUR LUNGS WITH BLOOD AND THUNDER WHEN YOU SEE THE WHITE WHALE BREAK YOUR BACKS AND CRACK YOUR OARS MEN IF YOU WISH TO PREVAIL THIS IVORY LEG IS WHAT PROPELS ME HARPOONS THRUST IN THE SKY AIM DIRECTLY FOR HIS CROOKED BROW AND LOOK HIM STRAIGHT IN THE EYE

Then everyone in the store started chanting "WHITE WHALE HOLY GRAIL!"

At any rate that's how I got kicked out of FNM. Slightly embellished.

posts.post_content: This card is like a mix of [Lorthos, the Tidemaker](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Lorthos, the Tidemaker) and [Inkwell Leviathan](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Inkwell Leviathan), being a bit better than the former though a bit less cool, and a bit worse than the latter though a bit more cool.
